newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Singapore shares may slip ahead of weekend.
newsitem.headline: Singapore shares may slip ahead of weekend.

text.p: Singapore shares are likely to slip on Friday following an overnight fall on Wall Street and some bearish technical pointers, dealers said.
The benchmark Straits Times Industrials share Index ended 2.81 points higher at 2,067.17 on Thursday after trading in a narrow 30-point range in very thin volume all week.
Dealers said institutional buying interest was continuing but added that this tended to be focused on a few blue chip stocks.
Technical analysts said the Singapore stock market could drop in the short term to a low a little above 2,000 points.
New York's Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 27.05 points overnight to 7,330.18.
